themes: Concerns about frequent major program changes
Support for equity and DEI focus
Desire for Austin to lead in equity practices
key_phrases: Consistent grant deadlines: it's hard to plan for the future when you're not sure when, or if, a program is going to launch
Major changes don't need to be made every 2 or 3 years unless something is glaringly wrong
Major changes without analyzing the results can lead to unintended consequences
Tweaks or relatively easy to incorporate changes should be done for this round
The equity focus of the programs is great and I hope that won't go away
Austin needs to continue being the beacon and example of taking equity seriously and doing it right
barriers_identified: Uncertainty about grant program launch timing
solutions_proposed: Limit major program changes to when necessary and after analysis
Implement minor tweaks in the current round and reserve major changes for the next round
Maintain the equity focus of the programs
